channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Park not locked, 25th June
item.description:
Stanhope recreation ground is not locked at night. There are youths and dogs barking at 11pm. Can it be locked at dusk.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stanhope Grove, Beckenham, London

item.title: Outside flat 19 on Salusbury Road by the Numan Estate Agents, 25th June
item.description:

item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping rubbish, 25th June
item.description:
For a long time (likely a year) a build up of disgusting rubbish has been being dumped behind the fence at the corner of Glebe and station road. It is attracting vermin and we have had several rats make their way into our home and have had to buy rat traps. It is vile and a health hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grierson road hasn’t been swept for weeks!, 25th June
item.description:
This is a v busy street w high footfall as the route to station, school, shops etc It obviously hasn’t been swept for weeks and us getting dirtier and dirtier. I understand you’re trying to save money but it’s becoming a health hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grierson Road, Honor Oak, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Local business keeping fire door open and buns outside, 25th June
item.description:
Local businesses keep placing bins in front of a fire door holding it open causing a public health and safety issue. As well as the bins being close to doors of private residents. The need to move these.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Standard Place, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 25th June
item.description:
Local business is throwing out their old machines, renovation materials and bedding. Been there for a week now with more items added daily. Not deterred by CCTV.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Standard Place, Hackney, London
